Performing Pooja for Marriage Ceremony acts as an invitation to the many Gods and Goddesses by performing various rituals to come and bless the couple. products.name: Yagnopavit Sanskar
products.description: Yagnopavit Sanskar or Upnayan Sanskar is performed to a boy who enters the age of 8. It makes a person fit to receive instruction in the Vedas and spread divine power throughout the world. Panditji begins this puja with Gauri Ganesh puja, Punyaha Vachan, Maha Sankalpam, Kalash puja, Upnayan. The havan is performed as per the Shastras. A Brahmin is also called a Dwija that means the one who is born twice. A boy is said to be born again when you perform Janeu Sanskar. A sacred thread, called Janeu or Yajnopaveetam is placed around the left shoulder of the boy.

Insights:.text: The boy attains the right to study Vedas through this sanskar.
This allows a Brahman boy to enter into Brahmacharya Avastha.
The three threads stand for Brahma, Vishnu, and Siva.

products.name: Shukra Graha Shanti Jaap
products.description:
ऊँ अन्नात् परिस्त्रु रसं ब्रह्मणा व्यपिबत् क्षत्रं पयः सोमं प्रजापतिः।
ऋतेन सत्यमिनिद्रयं विपानं शुक्रमन्धस इन्द्रस्येन्द्रियमिदं पयोमृतं मधु॥

Shukra Graha governs the attributes like passion, beauty, love, marriage, sex, etc. Performing this Jaap gives the power to control the sense organs and enables the person to live a happy life full of love and bliss. This Graha is mainly accountable for Romance, Beauty, passion, luxury, etc. If a person has Shukra dosh in the horoscope, it leads to loss of wealth, marital problems, loss of bodily luster.

Insights:.text: Main Deity: Shukra (Venus).
Done on Fridays or an auspicious date compatible with your Janma Nakshatra.
To gain a good relationship with a spouse or partner and to get rid of malefic effects by Shukra Dasha.
To gain a positive attractive charm.

Promise.text: All rituals follow Vedic Standards and Procedures.
High-quality Samagri to ensure a pleasant Puja experience.

products.name: Shani Graha Shanti Jaap
products.description:
ऊँ शं नो देवीरभिष्टय आपो भवन्तु पीतये। शं योरभि स्त्रवन्तु नः।

Shani god signifies judgment, discipline, truthfulness in a person’s life. Malefic Shani Graha causes a lot of hurdles in life. All the malefic effects of the Shani Graha dosh can be overcome by performing this Jaap. When this Graha is malefic or misplaced, the person must go through hardships and unhealthy life.

Insights:.text: Main Deity: Shani (Saturn).
Done on Saturdays or an auspicious date compatible with your Janma Nakshatra.
It helps to bring in structure and rules to achieve one’s goals.
The remedy for Punarpho dosha, Shani dosh.

Promise.text: All rituals follow Vedic Standards and Procedures.
High-quality Samagri to ensure a pleasant Puja experience.

products.name: Rahu Graha Shanti Jaap
products.description:
ऊँ कयानश्चित्र आभुवदूतीसदा वृध: सखा । कयाशश्चिष्ठया वृता ।

Rahu graha is associated with material manifestation and worldly desires. Rahu brings separations in family and lots of unwanted problems if it is wrongly placed. All the malefic effects of the Rahu can be overcome by performing this Jaap.

Insights:.text: Main Deity: Rahu.
Done on an auspicious date compatible with your Janma Nakshatra.
It controls any kind of addiction and helps take control of one’s life.
Performed for Sarpa/Rahu Dosha Nivrithi.

Promise.text: All rituals follow Vedic Standards and Procedures.
High-quality Samagri to ensure a pleasant Puja experience.

products.name: Ketu Graha Shanti Jaap
products.description:
ऊँ केतुं कृवन्नकेतवे पेशो मर्या अपेशसे समुषद्भिरजायथाः |

People afflicted by malefic Ketu suffer from theft, Putra dosha, absent-mindedness, and loss of property. All the bad effects of the Ketu Graha dosha can be overcome by performing this Jaap. A malefic or misplaced Ketu in the horoscope can endure harsh, merciless, and cruel. By performing this Jaap or Ketu Graha Shanti one attains all the positive results from Ketu.

Insights:.text: Main Deity: Ketu.
Done on an auspicious date compatible with your Janma Nakshatra.
Performed when one is undergoing a malefic Ketu Dasha in the horoscope.
Performed for Ketu/Sarpa Dosha Nivaran.

Promise.text: All rituals follow Vedic Standards and Procedures.
High-quality Samagri to ensure a pleasant Puja experience.

products.name: Gayatri Mantra Jaap
products.description:
॥ॐ भूर्भुवः स्वः तत्सवितुर्वरेण्यम् भर्गो देवस्य धीमहि धियो यो नः प्रचोदयात् ॥

Gayatri Mata is considered the mother of all four Vedas. Performing this Jaap brings the blessings of the Sun, eradicates the sins of past life, helps to get rid of pitru dosh, enlightens and enables a person to possess divine qualities and success in life.

Insights:.text: Main Deity: Gayatri and Savita.
Performed as per Janma Nakshatra and Agnivas.
Helps to get rid of Pitru dosh.
To achieve Victory and Success in life.

Promise.text: All rituals follow Vedic Standards and Procedures.
High-quality Samagri to ensure a pleasant Puja experience.

products.name: Maha Mrityunjay Jaap
products.description:
ॐ हौं जूं सः ॐ भूर्भुवः स्वः ॐ त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम् उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान्मृ त्योर्मुक्षीय मामृतात् ॐ स्वः भुवः भूः ॐ सः जूं हौं ॐ।

Maha Mrityunjaya Jaap is performed to receive the blessings of Shivji to avoid untimely death and achieve Victory (Jaya) over death (Mritya). Mrityunjaya Jaap rejuvenates, bestows health, wealth, long life, peace, prosperity, and contentment.

Insights:.text: Main Deity: Lord Mrityunjaya.
Done on Sravan, Karthik Month, or Janma Nakshatra.
Mrithyunjaya means “Conqueror of Death”.
To achieve Jaya or Victory over Mrityu (death).

Promise.text: All rituals follow Vedic Standards and Procedures.
High-quality Samagri to ensure a pleasant Puja experience.

products.name: Santan Gopal Mantra Jaap
products.description:
ॐ श्रीं ह्रीं क्लीं ग्लौं देवकीसुत गोविन्द वासुदेव जगत्पते। देहि मे तनयं कृष्ण त्वामहं शरणं गत:।।

Santan means heir and Gopala Krishna is the infant or baby Krishna. Any couple who are having problems in begetting the baby should perform this Jaap to get blessed with a baby by the blessings from Lord Krishna. Couples who are not blessed with a baby must perform this Jaap to get the blessings of Lord Krishna to get the baby.

Insights:.text: Main Deity: Lord Krishna.
Done on Thursdays or any auspicious date compatible nakshatra.
Performed by those experiencing a delay in parenthood.
To ensure a healthy and intelligent child.

Promise.text: All rituals follow Vedic Standards and Procedures.
High-quality Samagri to ensure a pleasant Puja experience.

products.name: Akhand Ramayan Path
products.description: Akhand Ramayan Path is the recital of Ramcharit manas continuously without stopping for 24 hours, it is performed with Bhajans and Kirtans praising the Lord Shri Ram and his life teachings to get the blessings and peaceful life. The entire text includes seven kaands i.e. Baalkand, Ayodhyakand, Aranyakand, Kishkindhakand, Sundarkand, Lankakand and Uttarkand. Each kaands describes the different stages and leelas of Lord Shree Ram.

Insights:.text: Main Deity: Lord Shri Ram and Bhakt Hanuman.
Ramayan path is done for 24 hrs continuously.
Performed on any auspicious days.
Helps in bringing peace and prosperity.
Performed for glorifying Lord Ram.

Promise.text: All rituals follow Vedic Standards and Procedures.
High-quality Samagri to ensure a pleasant Puja experience.

products.name: Durga Saptashati Path
products.description: Durga Saptashati path is dedicated to Durga Devi. Performing this path protects and helps a person to overcome all troubles and sufferings. This puja also liberates a person from evil eyes, fears, and curses. It is considered to be auspicious when performed during Navratri or Fridays. This puja helps a person to possess a trouble-free life, clearing all the obstacles in the path of success.

Insights:.text: Main Deity: Durga Mata.
Done during Navratri time or Fridays.

products.name: Hanuman Chalisa Path
products.description: Lord Hanuman is one of the Chiranjeevis. Performing the Hanuman Chalisa path helps a person to get total focus over the mind and body. It assists to get rid of all the fear and invokes the blessings of Lord Hanuman. Hanuman Chalisa Path is a collection of Hindu Devotional Hymns (forty chaupais) addressing Lord Hanuman, the most ardent devotee of Lord Rama, known for his loyalty, devotion, strength, valor, courage, wisdom, and celibacy. Reciting the Hanuman Chalisa path helps one person to get total focus over the mind and body.

Insights:.text: Main Deity: Bhakt Hanumanji.
Can be performed on Tuesdays, Saturdays.
Conducted for removing any fear among the devotees.
Helps to flourish in business by removing obstacles.

products.name: Annaprashan Puja
products.description: Annaprashan is the ceremony where the baby is introduced to solid foods preferably Sweet/Milk Rice for the first time. The puja is performed to bestow a very healthy and prosperous life for the baby.

Insights:.text: Baby takes solid food for the first time.
It helps the baby to grow healthy and strong.
Performed on 6th or 7th month on Janma Nakshatra day.
Mantras are chanted for the baby’s well-being.
Kheer or Milk Rice is the main ingredient for the ceremony.
